##### FILE: frontend_app_deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: registry.com/frontend-image:latest
        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: frontend-port

---

##### FILE: frontend_mongo_express.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap
        image: mongo-express
        name: mongo-express
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/mongo-express failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

##### FILE: frontend_mongo_express1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-express:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-express
  name: mongo-express
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-express
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-express
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_url
              name: mongodb-configmap

##### FILE: frontend1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mpfrontend-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mpfrontend-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  disruptionBudget:
    maxUnavailable: 1
  minReadySeconds: 30
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mpfrontend
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mpfrontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: bisho11/miniprojetfrontend:prod
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: mpfrontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: frontend-port
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mpfrontend-deployment

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/mpfrontend-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/mpfrontend-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/mpfrontend-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: frontend
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: PRODUCT_CATALOG_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: productcatalogservice:3550
        - name: CURRENCY_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: currencyservice:7000
        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: cartservice:7070
        - name: RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        - name: SHOPPING_ASSISTANT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shoppingassistantservice:80
        - name: ENABLE_PROFILER
          value: "0"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/frontend:v0.10.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-liveness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: frontend

##### FILE: frontend193.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: COFFEE_SERVER_API
          value: http://api:80
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: qjoly/kubernetes-coffee-image:frontend
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 256Mi
      serviceAccount: frontend
      serviceAccountName: frontend

---

##### FILE: frontend21_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mpfrontend-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mpfrontend-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  disruptionBudget:
    maxUnavailable: 1
  minReadySeconds: 30
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mpfrontend
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mpfrontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: bisho11/miniprojetfrontend:prod
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: mpfrontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: frontend-port
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080

---

##### FILE: frontend24_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to exam/Deployment/frontend-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend-deployment
  namespace: exam
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: amjedchakhis/frontend:1.0.0
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http-port
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5

      app: frontend

            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http-port

          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5

            - touch
            - /tmp/healthy

##### FILE: frontend29_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to globoticket/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: frontend
  name: frontend
  namespace: globoticket
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 2
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
          value: Development
        - name: ApiConfigs__ConcertCatalog__Uri
          value: http://catalog:8080
        - name: ApiConfigs__Ordering__Uri
          value: http://ordering:8080
        image: psgloboticketdemo.azurecr.io/frontend
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health/lively
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /health/ready
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 20
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 750m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 500Mi
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: acr-secret

---

##### FILE: frontend37.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: PRODUCT_CATALOG_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: productcatalogservice:3550
        - name: CURRENCY_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: currencyservice:7000
        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: cartservice:7070
        - name: RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        - name: ENABLE_PROFILER
          value: "0"
        image: frontend
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-liveness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: PRODUCT_CATALOG_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: productcatalogservice:3550
        - name: CURRENCY_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: currencyservice:7000
        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: cartservice:7070
        - name: RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        - name: ENABLE_PROFILER
          value: "0"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/frontend:v0.8.1
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-liveness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default

##### FILE: frontend4_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to exam/Deployment/frontend-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend-deployment
  namespace: exam
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: amjedchakhis/frontend:1.0.0
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http-port
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        startupProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - touch
            - /tmp/healthy
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5

---

##### FILE: frontend43.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicaSet/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: guestbook
    tier: frontend
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchExpressions:
    - key: tier
      operator: In
      values:
      - frontend
    matchLabels:
      tier: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: guestbook
        tier: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GET_HOSTS_FROM
          value: dns
        image: gcr.io/google_samples/gb-frontend:v3
        name: php-redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

---

##### FILE: frontend48.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: frontend
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: PRODUCT_CATALOG_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: productcatalogservice:3550
        - name: CURRENCY_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: currencyservice:7000
        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: cartservice:7070
        - name: RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        - name: ENABLE_PROFILER
          value: "0"
        image: frontend
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-liveness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/frontend

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/frontend

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/frontend failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/frontend failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/frontend failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Deployment/frontend failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:

  namespace: default

    matchLabels:

  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: PRODUCT_CATALOG_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: productcatalogservice:3550
        - name: CURRENCY_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: currencyservice:7000
        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: cartservice:7070
        - name: RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        - name: ENABLE_PROFILER
          value: "0"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/frontend:v0.9.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-liveness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default

##### FILE: frontend5_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to exam/Deployment/frontend-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend-deployment
  namespace: exam
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: dahhouilyas/frontend:1.0.6
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http-port
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        startupProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - touch
            - /tmp/healthy
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/word-app-frontend-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: word-app-frontend-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: word-app-frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: word-app-frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: WELCOME_MESSAGE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: welcome_message
              name: word-app-secret
        image: word-app-frontend
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: word-app-frontend-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: frontend56.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: frontend
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: PRODUCT_CATALOG_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: productcatalogservice:3550
        - name: CURRENCY_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: currencyservice:7000
        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: cartservice:7070
        - name: RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        - name: ENABLE_PROFILER
          value: "0"
        image: frontend
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-liveness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/frontend

1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: PRODUCT_CATALOG_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: productcatalogservice:3550
        - name: CURRENCY_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: currencyservice:7000
        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: cartservice:7070
        - name: RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        - name: ENABLE_PROFILER
          value: "0"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/frontend:v0.9.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-liveness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default

##### FILE: frontend64.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
        track: stable
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.9.14
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /usr/sbin/nginx
              - -s
              - quit
        name: nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: nginx-frontend-conf
        - mountPath: /etc/tls
          name: tls-certs
      volumes:
      - name: tls-certs
        secret:
          secretName: tls-certs
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: frontend.conf
            path: frontend.conf
          name: nginx-frontend-conf
        name: nginx-frontend-conf

---

        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR

          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        - name: ENABLE_PROFILER
          value: "0"
        image: frontend
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-liveness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default

##### FILE: frontend69.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/rewriteAppHTTPProbers: "true"
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: PRODUCT_CATALOG_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: productcatalogservice:3550
        - name: CURRENCY_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: currencyservice:7000
        - name: CART_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: cartservice:7070
        - name: RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: recommendationservice:8080
        - name: SHIPPING_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: shippingservice:50051
        - name: CHECKOUT_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: checkoutservice:5050
        - name: AD_SERVICE_ADDR
          value: adservice:9555
        - name: ENABLE_PROFILER
          value: "0"
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/microservices-demo/frontend:v0.9.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-liveness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Cookie
              value: shop_session-id=x-readiness-probe
            path: /_healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: default

---

kind: Deployment

    app: frontend
  name: frontend
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:

          value: Development
        - name: ApiConfigs__ConcertCatalog__Uri
          value: http://catalog:8080
        - name: ApiConfigs__Ordering__Uri
          value: http://ordering:8080
        image: frontend
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

            path: /_healthz

    app: frontend

    matchLabels:
      app: frontend

        - name: ApiConfigs__ConcertCatalog__Uri
          value: http://catalog:8080
        - name: ApiConfigs__Ordering__Uri
          value: http://ordering:8080
        image: psgloboticketdemo.azurecr.io/frontend
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 750m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 500Mi

##### FILE: frontend82.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - backend
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - frontend
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: frontend

---

##### FILE: frontend86.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
        track: stable
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.9.14
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /usr/sbin/nginx
              - -s
              - quit
        name: nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: nginx-frontend-conf
        - mountPath: /etc/tls
          name: tls-certs
      volumes:
      - name: tls-certs
        secret:
          secretName: tls-certs
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: frontend.conf
            path: frontend.conf
          name: nginx-frontend-conf
        name: nginx-frontend-conf

---

##### FILE: frontend89.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: frontend
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: frontend-configmaps
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_PORT
              name: frontend-configmaps
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_USER
              name: frontend-configmaps
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_NAME
              name: frontend-configmaps
        - name: PHP_INI
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: PHP_INI
              name: frontend-configmaps
        - name: DB_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASS
              name: frontend-secrets
        image: docker-registry:5000/4linux-php:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /login.php
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: 4linux-php
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.4"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 64Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app
          name: frontend-claim-nfs
        - mountPath: /app/php-ini/
          name: config-volume-php
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: regcred
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - if [ ! -d "/app/latest" ]; then cd /app && rm -rf ..?* .[!.]* * && git clone
          https://github.com/4linux/4linux-php.git /app; fi
        image: alpine/git:2.40.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: git
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 64Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app
          name: frontend-claim-nfs
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: php-config
        name: config-volume-php
      - name: frontend-claim-nfs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: frontend-claim-nfs

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to globoticket/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: frontend
  name: frontend
  namespace: globoticket
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 2
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
          value: Development
        - name: ApiConfigs__ConcertCatalog__Uri
          value: http://catalog:8080
        - name: ApiConfigs__Ordering__Uri
          value: http://ordering:8080
        image: psgloboticketdemo.azurecr.io/frontend
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health/lively
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /health/ready
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 20
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 750m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 500Mi
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: acr-secret

---

##### FILE: frontend90.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: frontend
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: frontend-configmaps
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_PORT
              name: frontend-configmaps
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_USER
              name: frontend-configmaps
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_NAME
              name: frontend-configmaps
        - name: PHP_INI
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: PHP_INI
              name: frontend-configmaps
        - name: DB_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASS
              name: frontend-secrets
        image: docker-registry:5000/4linux-php:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /login.php
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: 4linux-php
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.4"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app
          name: frontend-claim-nfs
        - mountPath: /app/php-ini/
          name: config-volume-php
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: regcred
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - if [ ! -d "/app/latest" ]; then cd /app && rm -rf ..?* .[!.]* * && git clone
          https://github.com/4linux/4linux-php.git /app; fi
        image: alpine/git:2.40.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: git
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 64Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app
          name: frontend-claim-nfs
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: php-config
        name: config-volume-php
      - name: frontend-claim-nfs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: frontend-claim-nfs

---

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: amigos
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

Generation completed successfully.

##### FILE: Frontend95_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to foxden/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: frontend
  name: frontend
  namespace: foxden
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "8344"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: frontend
        env: k8s
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /data/srv
        env:
        - name: FOXDEN_CONFIG
          value: /etc/secrets/.foxden.yaml
        image: ghcr.io/chesscomputing/frontend:v0.0.3-test2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Accept
              value: application/json
            path: /apis
            port: 8344
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8344
          name: foxden
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 8000m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/secrets
          name: secrets
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/schemas
          name: schemas
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: secrets
        secret:
          secretName: foxden-secrets
      - name: schemas
        secret:
          secretName: schema-secrets

---

            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy

        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http-port

            - cat

          periodSeconds: 5

            command:
            - touch
            - /tmp/healthy
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5

##### FILE: fsdp_qlora_job_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/multinode-job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: multinode-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  completionMode: Indexed
  completions: 2
  parallelism: 2
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - torchrun --nnodes=$NNODES --node_rank=$JOB_COMPLETION_INDEX --nproc_per_node=$NGPUS
          --master_addr $MASTER_ADDR --master_port $MASTER_PORT selective_code_rewriter.py
          --world_size=2 --master_addr=$MASTER_ADDR --master_port=$MASTER_PORT --model_name
          meta-llama/Meta-Llama-3-70B --batch_size 2 --context_length 512 --precision
          bf16 --train_type qlora --use_gradient_checkpointing true --use_cpu_offload
          true --dataset csdata --reentrant_checkpointing true --verbose True --save_model
          True --output_dir saved_model; sleep infinity
        env:
        - name: MASTER_ADDR
          value: multinode-job-0.multinode-svc.default.svc.cluster.local
        - name: MASTER_PORT
          value: "29500"
        - name: NNODES
          value: "2"
        - name: NGPUS
          value: "1"
        - name: NCCL_DEBUG
          value: ERROR
        image: kato0209/fsdp:latest
        name: multinode
        ports:
        - containerPort: 29500
          name: nccl
        resources:
          limits:
            nvidia.com/gpu: 1
      restartPolicy: Never
      subdomain: multinode-svc

---

##### FILE: fstrim1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Pod/fstrim-any:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: fstrim-any
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - /bin/bash
    - -c
    - while true; do sleep 10; done
    env:
    - name: SCRIPT_NAME
      value: fstrim.sh
    image: ghcr.io/onedr0p/kubanetics:2024.12.4
    name: fstrim
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 4000m
        memory: 1000Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 512Mi
    securityContext:
      privileged: true
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /proc
      name: procfs
    - mountPath: /sys
      name: netfs
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /proc
    name: procfs
  - hostPath:
      path: /sys
    name: netfs

---

    application/json application/rss+xml application/vnd.ms-fontobject application/x-font-ttf

    image/svg+xml image/x-icon text/css text/javascript text/plain text/x-component
    image/png

  client-header-buffer-size: 256k

  enable-modsecurity: "true"

    max_size=256m inactive=30m use_temp_path=off;

    SecAuditLog /var/log/audit/modsec.log

    SecAuditLogRelevantStatus 403
    SecAuditLogFormat JSON

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx-1/Deployment/ingress-nginx-1-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx-1
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.9.4
    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-4.8.3
  name: ingress-nginx-1-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx-1
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx-1
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx-1
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.9.4
        helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-4.8.3
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-1-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-nginx-1-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-ingress-nginx-1
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-1-controller
        - --ingress-class-by-name=true
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: harbor.iblog.pro/registryk8sio/ingress-nginx/controller:v1.9.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 10254
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 900Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: cluster-critical-pods
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-1
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300

    application/json application/rss+xml application/vnd.ms-fontobject application/x-font-ttf
    application/x-web-app-manifest+json application/xhtml+xml application/xml font/opentype
    image/svg+xml image/x-icon text/css text/javascript text/plain text/x-component
    image/png
  http-snippet: proxy_cache_path /tmp/nginx-cache-mp4 levels=1:2 keys_zone=mp4:50m
    max_size=256m inactive=30m use_temp_path=off;
  large-client-header-buffers: 4 256k
  log-format-escape-json: "true"
  log-format-upstream: '{"time":"","proxy_protocol_addr":"","remote_addr":"","x-forward-for":"","request_id":"","request":"","remote_user":"","bytes_sent":"","body_bytes_sent":"","request_time":"","status":"","vhost":"","request_proto":"","path":"","request_query":"","request_length":"","method":"","http_referrer":"","http_user_agent":"","upstream":"","upstream_ip":"","upstream_latency":"","upstream_status":"","tls":"/"}'
  modsecurity-snippet: |
    SecAuditLogType Serial
    SecAuditLog /var/log/audit/modsec.log
    SecAuditEngine RelevantOnly
    SecAuditLogRelevantStatus 403
    SecAuditLogFormat JSON
  proxy-buffer-size: 128k
  proxy-set-headers: ingress-nginx-2/ingress-nginx-2-custom-proxy-headers
  ssl-ciphers: ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:DHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES128-GCM-SHA256:kEDH+AESGCM:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:DHE-DSS-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:AES128-GCM-SHA256:AES256-GCM-SHA384:AES128-SHA256:AES256-SHA256:AES128-SHA:AES256-SHA:AES:CAMELLIA:DES-CBC3-SHA:!aNULL:!eNULL:!EXPORT:!DES:!RC4:!MD5:!PSK:!aECDH:!EDH-DSS-DES-CBC3-SHA:!EDH-RSA-DES-CBC3-SHA:!KRB5-DES-CBC3-SHA
  ssl-protocols: TLSv1 TLSv1.1 TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3
  use-gzip: "true"
kind: ConfigMap

  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx-2
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx-2/Deployment/ingress-nginx-2-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx-2
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.9.4
    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-4.8.3
  name: ingress-nginx-2-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx-2
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx-2
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx-2
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.9.4
        helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-4.8.3
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-2-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-nginx-2-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-ingress-nginx-2
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-2-controller
        - --ingress-class-by-name=true
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: harbor.iblog.pro/registryk8sio/ingress-nginx/controller:v1.9.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 10254
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 900Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: cluster-critical-pods
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-2
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300

  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: system-ingress
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm

    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx

  namespace: system-ingress

  - IPv4
  ipFamilyPolicy: SingleStack
  loadBalancerIP: 11.0.2.90
  ports:
  - appProtocol: http
    name: http
    port: 80
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: http
  - appProtocol: https
    name: https
    port: 443
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: https
  selector:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: system-ingress
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx

##### FILE: full.dump.system-ingress_9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system-ingress/Deployment/system-ingress-ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: system-ingress
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.9.4
    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-4.8.3
  name: system-ingress-ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: system-ingress
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: system-ingress
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: system-ingress
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.9.4
        helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-4.8.3
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/system-ingress-ingress-nginx-controller
        - --election-id=system-ingress-ingress-nginx-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-system-ingress
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/system-ingress-ingress-nginx-controller
        - --ingress-class-by-name=true
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: harbor.iblog.pro/registryk8sio/ingress-nginx/controller:v1.9.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 10254
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 900Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: cluster-critical-pods
      serviceAccountName: system-ingress-ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300

---

kind: Ingress
metadata:

    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/listen-ports: '[{"HTTP": 80}]'
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/scheme: internet-facing
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/target-type: ip
  name: mainlb
  namespace: workshop
spec:
  ingressClassName: alb
  rules:

      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: api
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /api
        pathType: Prefix

            name: frontend
            port:
              number: 3000

##### FILE: full-app-deployment_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: mydatabase
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: init-db-script-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: init-db-script
        name: init-db-script-volume

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fulldeploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fulldeploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: thispod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: thispod
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - dd if=/dev/zero of=/tmp/myfile bs=1M count=10; sleep 3600
        image: centos
        name: fillfile

---

##### FILE: full-example.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/httpecho:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    workloads.kcp.io/cluster: ""
  name: httpecho
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: httpecho
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: httpecho
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: jmalloc/echo-server
        name: httpecho
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-port
          protocol: TCP

---

##### FILE: full-example_2.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/httpecho:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: httpecho
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: httpecho.kcp-apps.127.0.0.1.nip.io
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: httpecho
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

##### FILE: fullprobe.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19.2
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - curl
            - -f
            - http://localhost:80/
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: nginx
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.25
            memory: 128Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
          timeoutSeconds: 5

##### FILE: functions-config.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/supabase-functions:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  index.ts: |
    import { serve } from 'https://deno.land/std@0.131.0/http/server.ts'
    import * as jose from 'https://deno.land/x/jose@v4.14.4/index.ts'

    console.log('main function started')

    const JWT_SECRET = Deno.env.get('JWT_SECRET')
    const VERIFY_JWT = Deno.env.get('VERIFY_JWT') === 'true'

    function getAuthToken(req: Request) {
      const authHeader = req.headers.get('authorization')
      if (!authHeader) {
        throw new Error('Missing authorization header')
      }
      const [bearer, token] = authHeader.split(' ')
      if (bearer !== 'Bearer') {
        throw new Error(`Auth header is not 'Bearer {token}'`)
      }
      return token
    }

    async function verifyJWT(jwt: string): Promise<boolean> {
      const encoder = new TextEncoder()
      const secretKey = encoder.encode(JWT_SECRET)
      try {
        await jose.jwtVerify(jwt, secretKey)
      } catch (err) {
        console.error(err)
        return false
      }
      return true
    }

    serve(async (req: Request) => {
      if (req.method !== 'OPTIONS' && VERIFY_JWT) {
        try {
          const token = getAuthToken(req)
          const isValidJWT = await verifyJWT(token)

          if (!isValidJWT) {
            return new Response(JSON.stringify({ msg: 'Invalid JWT' }), {
              status: 401,
              headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
            })
          }
        } catch (e) {
          console.error(e)
          return new Response(JSON.stringify({ msg: e.toString() }), {
            status: 401,
            headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
          })
        }
      }

      const url = new URL(req.url)
      const { pathname } = url
      const path_parts = pathname.split('/')
      const service_name = path_parts[1]

      if (!service_name || service_name === '') {
        const error = { msg: 'missing function name in request' }
        return new Response(JSON.stringify(error), {
          status: 400,
          headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        })
      }

      const servicePath = `/home/deno/functions/${service_name}`
      console.error(`serving the request with ${servicePath}`)

      const memoryLimitMb = 150
      const workerTimeoutMs = 1 * 60 * 1000
      const noModuleCache = false
      const importMapPath = null
      const envVarsObj = Deno.env.toObject()
      const envVars = Object.keys(envVarsObj).map((k) => [k, envVarsObj[k]])

      try {
        const worker = await EdgeRuntime.userWorkers.create({
          servicePath,
          memoryLimitMb,
          workerTimeoutMs,
          noModuleCache,
          importMapPath,
          envVars,
        })
        return await worker.fetch(req)
      } catch (e) {
        const error = { msg: e.toString() }
        return new Response(JSON.stringify(error), {
          status: 500,
          headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        })
      }
    })
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  name: supabase-functions
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: fwerbrouck-webtop-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fwerbrouck-webtop:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fwerbrouck-webtop
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fwerbrouck-webtop
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: fwerbrouck-webtop
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DOCKER_HOST
          value: tcp://localhost:2375
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: fwerbrouck-webtop-secrets
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/webtop-ubuntu-kde:main
        name: webtop
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      - args:
        - --host=tcp://0.0.0.0:2375
        - --tls=false
        env:
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        image: docker:dind
        name: docker-dind
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2375
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker
          name: docker-graph-storage
      volumes:
      - name: config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: fwerbrouck-webtop-config-pvc
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: docker-graph-storage

---

##### FILE: fwerbrouck-webtop-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/fwerbrouck-webtop-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-prod
    external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/target: inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    ingress.kubernetes.io/force-ssl-redirect: "true"
    kubernetes.io/tls-acme: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/add-base-url: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/client_max_body_size: 200m
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-read-timeout: "120"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/whitelist-source-range: 205.194.32.0/24,10.244.0.0/16,192.197.71.0/24
  name: fwerbrouck-webtop-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: fwerbrouck-webtop.inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: fwerbrouck-webtop-service
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - fwerbrouck-webtop.inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    secretName: fwerbrouck-webtop-tls

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: galera
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        k8up.io/backupcommand: mysqldump -uroot -psecure --all-databases
        pod.alpha.kubernetes.io/initialized: "true"
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: adfinissygroup/k8s-mariadb-galera-centos:v004
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        - containerPort: 4444
          name: sst
        - containerPort: 4567
          name: replication
        - containerPort: 4568
          name: ist
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /usr/share/container-scripts/mysql/readiness-probe.sh
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: datadir
          subPath: data
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 27
        runAsUser: 27
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: datadir
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 2Gi

---

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: galera
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

Generation completed successfully.
pass: 5, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0
