      labels:
        app: gateway-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: kubernetes,disableSecurity
        image: ghcr.io/ersms-24l/ersms-24l/gateway:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - sh
              - -c
              - sleep 10
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 240
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: gateway-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/readiness
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 125m
            memory: 250Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

##### FILE: gateway-deployment14_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/gateway-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/configuration-snippet: |
      more_set_headers "server: hide";
      more_set_headers "X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff";
      more_set_headers "X-Frame-Options: DENY";
      more_set_headers "X-Xss-Protection: 0";
      more_set_headers "Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload";
      more_set_headers "Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' https://geoserver.yourdomain.com";
      more_set_headers "Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-site";
  name: gateway-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: geoserver.yourdomain.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: gateway
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - geoserver.yourdomain.com
    secretName: tls-secret

---

##### FILE: gateway-deployment15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/gateway-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: gateway
  name: gateway-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: gateway
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 3
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: gateway
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: redis-url
              name: redis-configmap
        - name: REDIS_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: redis-port
              name: redis-configmap
        - name: MONGO_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongo-url
              name: mongo-configmap
        - name: MONGO_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongo-port
              name: mongo-configmap
        - name: MONGO_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: RABBITMQ_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: rabbitmq-url
              name: rabbitmq-configmap
        - name: RABBITMQ_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: rabbitmq-port
              name: rabbitmq-configmap
        - name: RABBITMQ_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rabbitmq-username
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        - name: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rabbitmq-password
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: gateway-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: gateway-secret
        image: pritamsarkar123/vtm3_gateway_kube_2024:latest
        name: gateway
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

            name: gateway-configmap

            name: gateway-secret

      target:

        type: Utilization

##### FILE: gateway-httproute_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/echo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: echo
  name: echo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: echo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: echo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /agnhost
        - netexec
        - --http-port=8080
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: registry.k8s.io/e2e-test-images/agnhost:2.40
        name: echo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 10m

---

##### FILE: gateway-service1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/gateway-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: gateway
  name: gateway-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: gateway
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: gateway
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: moonsungkim/gateway-amd
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actutator/health
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: gateway
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
      serviceAccountName: gateway

---

##### FILE: gateway-service11_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to cctns-new/Deployment/psa-gateway-server-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: gateway-app
  name: psa-gateway-server-app
  namespace: cctns-new
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: gateway-app
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: gateway-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CONFIG_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: config_server_address
              name: psa-config-cm
        - name: GATEWAY_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: gateway_server_address
              name: psa-gateway-cm
        - name: EUREKA_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: eureka_server_address
              name: psa-eureka-cm
        - name: APPLICATION_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: server_address
              name: psa-gateway-cm
        - name: SERVER_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: server_port
              name: psa-gateway-cm
        - name: ACTIVE_PROFILE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: ACTIVE_PROFILE
              name: active-profile
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Kolkata
        image: docker-registry:5000/psa-gateway-server:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: gateway-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /root/logs
          name: logs-volume
      serviceAccount: cctns
      serviceAccountName: cctns
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /Data_NAS_NEW/microservice-log/gateway/
          type: ""
        name: logs-volume

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to service/Deployment/gateway-svc-pods:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: gateway-svc-pods
  namespace: service
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: gateway-svc
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: gateway-svc
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - gateway
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: service-config
        image: IMAGE_REGISTRY_PATH/services:REVISION_ID
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /status
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 180
        name: gateway-svc-cont
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /status
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 2
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log/oms
          name: log-data
      topologySpreadConstraints:
      - labelSelector:
          matchLabels:
            app: gateway-svc
        maxSkew: 1
        topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
        whenUnsatisfiable: ScheduleAnyway
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: log-data

---

    kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.retries: "3"
    kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.start_period: 8s

    kompose.service.type: loadbalancer

    io.kompose.service: gateway-tcp
  name: gateway
  namespace: default

  - name: "8080"
    port: 8080

  type: LoadBalancer

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/actual-gatus-ep:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  config.yaml: |
    endpoints:
      - name: "actual"
        group: 'Apps - SelfHosted'
        url: "https://actual.${DOMAIN_NAME}/"
        interval: 1m
        client:
          dns-resolver: tcp://1.1.1.1:53
        conditions:
          - "[STATUS] == 401"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    gatus.io/enabled: "true"
  name: actual-gatus-ep
  namespace: default

##### FILE: gatus48.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/prometheus-gatus-ep:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  config.yaml: |
    endpoints:
      - name: prometheus
        group: guarded
        url: 1.1.1.1
        interval: 1m
        ui:
          hide-hostname: true
          hide-url: true
        dns:
          query-name: "prometheus.${SECRET_DOMAIN}"
          query-type: A
        conditions:
          - "len([BODY]) == 0"
        alerts:
          - type: pushover
      - name: prometheus
        group: internal
        url: "https://prometheus.${SECRET_DOMAIN}/"
        interval: 1m
        conditions:
          - "[STATUS] == 200"
        alerts:
          - type: pushover
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    gatus.io/enabled: "true"
  name: prometheus-gatus-ep
  namespace: default

apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1

metadata:
  annotations:
    meta.helm.sh/release-name: jxboot-helmfile-resources

    gitops.jenkins-x.io/pipeline: namespaces

  - jenkins.io

  - list
  - delete

  - environments

  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch

  - plugins

  - get

  - watch

  - ""

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/gcp-auth:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: gcp-auth
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/gcp-auth:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: gcp-auth
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace

      "project_id": "external-secrets-operator",
      "private_key_id": "",
      "private_key": "-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----\nA key\n-----END PRIVATE KEY-----\n",

      "client_id": "client ID",
      "auth_uri": "https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/auth",
      "token_uri": "https://oauth2.googleapis.com/token",
      "auth_provider_x509_cert_url": "https://www.googleapis.com/oauth2/v1/certs",
      "client_x509_cert_url": "https://www.googleapis.com/robot/v1/metadata/x509/test-service-account%!e(MISSING)xternal-secrets-operator.iam.gserviceaccount.com"
    }

          1

            memory: 512Mi

          name: cache-volume
      volumes:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/llama-13b-gptq:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: llama-13b-gptq
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: llama-13b-gptq
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: llama-13b-gptq
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - python3 -m vllm.entrypoints.openai.api_server --model ${MODEL_NAME} --gpu-memory-utilization
          0.8 --dtype float16
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        env:
        - name: HUGGING_FACE_HUB_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: HF_TOKEN
              name: huggingface-secret
        - name: MODEL_NAME
          value: TheBloke/Llama-2-13B-chat-GPTQ
        image: vllm/vllm-openai:latest
        name: vllm-container-llama-13b-gptq
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: llama-13b-gptq
        resources:
          limits:
            nvidia.com/mig-3g.20gb: 1
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
            nvidia.com/mig-3g.20gb: 1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /root/.cache/huggingface
          name: cache-volume
      volumes:
      - name: cache-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: huggingface-cache-pvc-rmw

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/vllm-router:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: vllm-router
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: vllm-router
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: vllm-router
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - cd /app; python3 router.py
        command:
        - bash
        - -c
        env:
        - name: MODELS
          value: |
            meta-llama/Llama-2-7b-chat-hf=http://llama-7b.default.svc.cluster.local:8000,
            TheBloke/Llama-2-7B-chat-GPTQ=http://llama-7b-gptq.default.svc.cluster.local:8000,
            TheBloke/Llama-2-13B-chat-GPTQ=http://llama-13b-gptq.default.svc.cluster.local:8000,
        image: quay.io/llm_router/vllm-router:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: vllm-router
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: vllm-port
      serviceAccountName: vllm-router-sa

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/istiod-istio-system:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app: istiod
    release: istio
  name: istiod-istio-system
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - admissionregistration.k8s.io
  resources:
  - mutatingwebhookconfigurations
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch
  - update
  - patch
- apiGroups:
  - admissionregistration.k8s.io
  resources:
  - validatingwebhookconfigurations
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch
  - update
- apiGroups:
  - config.istio.io
  - security.istio.io
  - networking.istio.io
  - authentication.istio.io
  - rbac.istio.io
  - telemetry.istio.io

  - '*'
  verbs:
  - get
  - watch
  - list

  - networking.istio.io

  - workloadentries

  - get
  - watch
  - list
  - update
  - patch
  - create
  - delete
- apiGroups:
  - networking.istio.io

  - watch

  - patch
  - create
  - delete

  - apiextensions.k8s.io

  - get
  - list

  - ""

  - pods

  - services

  - get
  - list

  - get
  - list

##### FILE: gen-istio-cluster_25.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ValidatingWebhookConfiguration/istiod-default-validator:
apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1
kind: ValidatingWebhookConfiguration
metadata:
  labels:
    app: istiod
    istio: istiod
    istio.io/rev: default
    release: istio
  name: istiod-default-validator
  namespace: default
webhooks:
- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1beta1
  - v1
  clientConfig:
    service:
      name: istiod
      namespace: istio-system
      path: /validate
  failurePolicy: Ignore
  name: validation.istio.io
  rules:
  - apiGroups:
    - security.istio.io
    - networking.istio.io
    apiVersions:
    - '*'
    operations:
    - CREATE
    - UPDATE
    resources:
    - '*'
  sideEffects: None

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to istio-operator/Deployment/istio-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: istio-operator
  namespace: istio-operator
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: istio-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: istio-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - operator
        - server
        env:
        - name: WATCH_NAMESPACE
          value: istio-system
        - name: LEADER_ELECTION_NAMESPACE
          value: istio-operator
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: OPERATOR_NAME
          value: istio-operator
        - name: WAIT_FOR_RESOURCES_TIMEOUT
          value: 300s
        - name: REVISION
          value: ""
        image: gcr.io/istio-testing/operator:1.14-dev
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: istio-operator
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 1337
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1337
      serviceAccountName: istio-operator

---
